title: Bacon and mushroom penne
ingredients: ['1 (500g) packet penne pasta', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, divided', '175g (6 oz) smoked bacon, chopped', '1 (200g) punnet mushrooms, sliced', '8 cloves garlic, minced', '750ml (1 1/4 pints) chicken stock', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '50g (2 oz) freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
